content:
Hi all, working on the text/examples/etc. for the R5 Subscription, and came across an issue when trying update the descriptions around the email/sms channel.

The TL;DR is that I see too much difference in the two channels (e.g., what does an attachment mean for SMS) and would propose splitting them into two (2) different channels.

Can get into a more involved discussion if people are interested, but I believe there are few (though important) use cases around either.

Thanks!

/poll Email-SMS channel type
keep as one channel
split into two channels
well, they already are two different channels, so I think you mean, 'split the documentation more explicitly'
